The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 24 August is 2,907 (336.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 20 August, there were 42 new confirmed cases (4.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 August, there were 29 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 45% (13 extra cases).
